title: Request for French language option for NA

replies.body: It doesn't look like French is one of the available languages on NA unfortunately, but if you do need French as your language you should be able to region transfer to EU.
so in NA you can't change the language of your client freely like in EUW ? that's messed up man..
Yes, they know. They are saying they wish French would become an available language in NA.
sucks to have to pay for a transfer where you would get a worse connection
